ygData.subject: Re: Halas
ygData.msgSnippet: The caster quest can be found from Halas Shaman guild(The person standing at entrance to guild). The goblin caster can be found at igloo located along the
ygData.messageBody:
The caster quest can be found from Halas Shaman guild(The person standing at
entrance to guild). The goblin caster can be found at igloo located along the
mountain near the big plain to Permafrost. For lvl 5 shaman , u ned at least 1
ppl to grp with u to survive, unless u chose to stand on surface and hunt the
weaker gnolls (Not so good since lots of ppl r doing the same thing and oni 3
or 4 gnoll spawn there) And be prepared to die a few times since there's
always train appearing and they loved to slice up lvl 5 shaman :)

Basically once u reach lvl 5 , u ned to go BB to hunt . No choice here since
the monsters at everfrost con green when u reach lvl 5.

Dexter Wong wrote:

> From: Dexter Wong <dexterw@...>
>
> Does anyone has a character in Halas??? If yes and if someday Ur going to
> the other towns pls if possible let me know...cos I wish to go but donno
> how to.
> Can?
> BTW today I was in everfrost killing goblin casters and someone talked abt
> caster quest...anyone knows what it is?
> And is a lvl 5 Shaman good enough to go to BB?
